name: Martin's Magical Mess (ARPG Demo)
description:
I've been fully focused on game development since June 2017. I digs the games and digs making the games! I'm looking to put out fun, thought-out games that don't suck. I definitely have a focus on the RPG-side of things,  and now have a small site where I discuss my work, different aspects making games, and do write-ups on game development concepts.

If you'd like to find out more about the game, myself, or just get in contact with me, check out https://neetfreek.net/
